basics.name: Ismael Melgarejo
basics.label: Junior Frontend Developer
basics.summary: Desarrollador frontend con conocimientos básicos en la creación de interfaces web utilizando HTML, CSS y JavaScript. Experiencia previa de 8 años en administración de infraestructura IT, Servidores Linux y virtualización.

projects.name: Personal Portfolio
projects.description: A personal portfolio website to showcase my projects and skills.
highlights: Built with React and Tailwind CSS
Includes a blog and contact form

projects.name: Weather App
projects.description: A web application that provides weather information for any location.
highlights: Built with JavaScript and OpenWeatherMap API
Responsive design

projects.name: Task Manager
projects.description: A simple task management app to keep track of daily tasks.
highlights: Built with Node.js and MongoDB
User authentication and CRUD operations

projects.name: E-commerce Site
projects.description: An online store built with Next.js and Stripe for payment processing.
highlights: Product management and shopping cart functionality
Secure payment integration
